name: Apple
description: A sweet, crisp fruit that comes in many varieties and colors. Apples are high in fiber and vitamin C.

comments.name: Fatuma Mwinyi
comments.comment: Apples are my favorite! So crisp and juicy.

comments.name: Hassan Bakari
comments.comment: Great for snacking, but I wish they were a bit sweeter.

comments.name: Amina Mbarak
comments.comment: They're good, but I prefer other fruits.

comments.name: Ali Salim
comments.comment: Perfect for making pies! Love them.

comments.name: Zahra Omar
comments.comment: Apples are versatile and healthy. Always a good choice.

name: Banana
description: A tropical fruit that is sweet and soft when ripe. Bananas are a great source of potassium.

comments.name: Sharifa Hassan
comments.comment: Bananas are a daily must-have! Super convenient and tasty.

comments.name: Salma Mwamburi
comments.comment: Great for smoothies and snacks. Could be a bit more firm though.

comments.name: Juma Ali
comments.comment: Perfect for a quick energy boost. Love them!

comments.name: Mwanaisha Khamis
comments.comment: Not bad, but they ripen too quickly.

comments.name: Musa Said
comments.comment: Good taste, but I prefer them a bit less ripe.

name: Orange
description: A citrus fruit known for its juicy, tangy taste and high vitamin C content.

comments.name: Fatma Abdalla
comments.comment: Oranges are refreshing, but peeling them can be a hassle.

comments.name: Ramadhan Suleiman
comments.comment: Juicy and full of flavor! Perfect for breakfast.

comments.name: Zubeida Ali
comments.comment: They're okay, but sometimes too acidic for my taste.

comments.name: Aisha Ahmed
comments.comment: Great for making fresh juice. Love the citrus taste.

comments.name: Mwanajuma Mshenga
comments.comment: Oranges are a must-have in my fruit basket. So good!

name: Strawberry
description: A bright red, juicy fruit with a sweet flavor. Strawberries are high in antioxidants and vitamin C.

comments.name: Said Mwinyi
comments.comment: Mangoes are the best! So sweet and juicy.

comments.name: Halima Ndegwa
comments.comment: Delicious, but sometimes they can be too fibrous.

comments.name: Abdullah Juma
comments.comment: Perfect for summer! Love them in smoothies.

comments.name: Bashir Omar
comments.comment: Good, but I prefer them less ripe.

comments.name: Mariamu Hassan
comments.comment: Great flavor, but hard to find the perfect ripeness.

name: Grapes
description: Small, sweet or tart fruits that grow in clusters. Grapes can be eaten fresh or used to make wine.

name: Watermelon
description: A large, juicy fruit with a thick green rind and sweet, red flesh. Watermelons are popular in the summer.

name: Mango
description: A tropical fruit with sweet, juicy flesh and a large pit. Mangoes are rich in vitamins A and C.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a tough, spiky exterior and sweet, tangy flesh inside.

name: Blueberry
description: Small, round berries that are sweet and slightly tart. Blueberries are high in antioxidants.

name: Peach
description: A juicy, sweet fruit with fuzzy skin and a large pit. Peaches are popular in desserts.
